content: s i m p l y v a n i l l a s o c k s by kieron pegg pattern information this is a simple sock pattern worked from the cuff down using your choice of ribbing and a stocking stitch leg once that is completed you will knit a heel flap and gusset followed by your choice of toe you will finish off the socks with the kitchener stitch gauge and sizing gauge 8 stitches per inch in stocking stitch sizing socks are sized in xs s m l approx finished sock circumference 7 8 9 10 materials yarn approx 100 grams or 400 meters of sock yarn sample socks use felt fusion merino nylon 4 ply in diplodyecus colourway needles 2 25mm knitting needles for your choice of working in the round notions stitch markers yarn needle extras sock blockers and wool soap optional abbreviations k2tog - knit two together ssk - slip slip knit p2tog - purl two together k - knit p - purl cuff of sock using the long tail cast on cast on 56 64 68 72 stitches join to work in the round and proceed to knit your ribbing of choice for my socks i use one of three ribbings pictured socks are 2x2 rib work as follows 2x2 rib - knit 2 purl 2 repeat across 1x1 rib - knit 1 purl 1 repeat across 1x1 twisted - knit 1 through the back loop purl 1 repeat across knit ribbing for desired length - i knit mine for 20 rounds proceed to leg leg of sock as these are vanilla socks i knit the leg in stocking stitch knit all stitches knit the leg for desired length - i knit between 50-60 rounds on the leg of my socks proceed to heel flap heel flap the heel flap will be worked back and forth across the 28 32 34 36 sole stitches in order to start this perform the set up set up knit 28 32 34 36 instep stitches proceed as follows row 1 rs slip 1 as if to purl knit 1 repeat across row 2 ws slip 1 as if to purl purl remaining stitches repeat row 1&2 14 16 17 18 times each - you will have worked a total of 28 32 34 36 row proceed to heel turn heel turn row 1 rs slip 1 knit 16 18 18 20 ssk knit 1 turn row 2 ws slip 1 purl 7 7 5 7 p2tog purl 1 turn row 3 slip 1 knit to 1 stitch before gap ssk knit 1 turn row 4 slip 1 purl to 1 stitch before gap p2tog purl 1 turn after working row 1-4 once repeat row 3-4 until all stitches are worked you will end on a wrong side row you now have 18 20 20 22 stitches remaining proceed to gusset pick up gusset pick up knit 9 10 10 11 stitches place marker this will
